name: Scrap Race (Kjarrigan, Flipez)
description:
Scrap Race

A puzzle adventure game by Flipez and Kjarrigan featuring our protagonist Scrat, who is a treasure hunter travelling through space to find the stuff from the good ol' days (instead of the valuable stuff his coworkers seek). He is a bit lazy which makes his journey unnecessarily harder...

This is our game entry for the GODOT WILD JAM # 35 - LOST TECH

We did some smaller games with Godot before but it's the first time we work together as a team to participate in a public Game Jam.

Controls

Nothing much to explain here:

  • Move with Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Interact with F
Resources
  • Made with
    • Godot 3.3
    • Aseprite
    • Trello
    • Pixaki
  • Fonts
    • OFL Fonts from Google Fonts
  • Sounds & Music
    • Intro "8 Bit Presentation" from fesliyanstudios.com
    • Level 1/Puzzle 1 from HumbleBundle - Music & SoundFX 2 07/2021
  • Sprites
    • Player "Buck Borris" from penusbmic
    • Intro, Level 1, Puzzle 1, Rocket, Bicycle, Switch, Decorations - Selfmade (A big thanks to juuljuul for helping with these)
    • Level 2 from penusbmic
    • Puzzle 2 from 0x72
    • F-Button - vryell
